definition: rendering (visual representation of how things will turn out)
to no avail/achieving nothing/totally ineffective/to have no effect/to fall flat (esp. of joke or speech that is completely ignored)

sentences.english: The rest is the content of the site with some light blueish hover effects.
sentences.chinese: 剩下的內容有淡青色的懸浮效果。

sentences.english: Is this image fresh enough to have an effect?
sentences.chinese: 這個形象的新鮮度夠不夠產生效果？

sentences.english: The unique design and construction is what makes it so effective.
sentences.chinese: 它的顯著效果來自其獨特的設計及構造。

sentences.english: The next step is to desaturate the layer that will take on the bloom effect.
sentences.chinese: 下一步是對圖層進行去飽和，圖層將獲得輝光效果。

sentences.english: The solubility increase is not obvious with nonionic surfactants added.
sentences.chinese: 它與非離子表面活性劑復配增溶效果不明顯。

sentences.english: The geology effect of 3-D seismic exploration in HK area, Jianghan region is presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要介紹江漢HK地區三維地震勘探的地質效果。

sentences.english: It's like having an array of stomp boxes ready for action.
sentences.chinese: 它有一個數組的單塊效果器隨時準備採取相應的行動。

sentences.english: Simulations have been made to validate the good separation performance of the algor…
sentences.chinese: 仿真驗證對聲音等非平穩信號具有良好的分離效果。

sentences.english: The effect of atomizing is better and burning is more full by improving nozzle structure inside and outside.
sentences.chinese: 同時改進燒嘴結構，使霧化效果更好，燃燒更加完全。

sentences.english: Under the condition of artificial feeding, effect of using cement quadrel to collect eggs was good.
sentences.chinese: 在人工飼養條件下，利用水泥方磚採卵效果良好。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the sustained release effect of Huangyangning Sustained-Released Tablets (HSRT).
sentences.chinese: 目的評價黃楊寧緩釋片的緩釋效果。

sentences.english: Are the program effects attainted at a reasonable cost?
sentences.chinese: 爲取得計劃效果所花費的成本是否合理？

sentences.english: Eachindependent cylinder's press-roller has precision micro-adjuster to guarantee the effect of sueding .
sentences.chinese: 每支獨立汽缸壓布輥精確的微調，能確保磨毛效果。

sentences.english: That is, with the same cost, a better con- trolling result can be obtained.
sentences.chinese: 用相同的費用就能達到更好的控制疾病的效果。

sentences.english: The experiment proves that the freshness of valuation data impacts the evaluation computation and the new algorithm is effective tot…
sentences.chinese: 算法應用於學生評教數據的處理，取得了良好的效果。

sentences.english: A few abilities have had the duration of the secondary effects extended, such as Dragon's Talon.
sentences.chinese: 一些技能的附加效果持續時間被延長，如巨龍鉤爪。

definition: to act on/to affect/action/function/activity/impact/result/effect/purpose/intent/to play a role/corresponds to English -ity, -ism, -ization/CL:個|个[ge4]
lit. set up a pole and see the shadow (idiom); fig. instant effect/quick results
lit. put up a pole and see the shadow (idiom); to expect instant results
to use/to employ/to apply/to make use of
